직업 II

CLASSES II

성기사

PALADIN

성향: Lawful good.

Hit Die: d10.

직업 스킬
Class Skills

The 성기사’s 직업 스킬 (and the key ability for each skill) are 집중 (Con), 제작 (Int), 외교 (Cha), 동물 조련 (Cha), 치료 (Wis), 지식 (nobility and royalty) (Int), 지식 (religion) (Int), 전문직 (Wis), 탑승 (Dex), and 의도 파악 (Wis).

Skill Points at 1 레벨: (2 + Int modifier) x4.

Skill Points at Each Additional 레벨: 2 + Int modifier.

Table: The 성기사

직업 특성
Class Features

All of the following are 직업 특성 of the 성기사.

Weapon and 갑옷 숙련: 성기사 are proficient with all simple and martial 무기, with all types of 갑옷 (heavy, medium, and 빛), and with 방패 (except tower 방패).

Aura of Good (Ex): The power of a 성기사’s aura of good (see the 선 감지 spell) is equal to her 성기사 레벨.

악 감지 (Sp): At will, a 성기사 can use 악 감지, as the spell.

Smite Evil (Su): Once per day, a 성기사 may attempt to smite evil with one normal melee 공격. She adds her 매력 bonus (if any) to her 명중 굴림 and deals 1 extra point of 피해 per 성기사 레벨. If the 성기사 accidentally smites a creature that is not evil, the smite has no effect, but the ability is still used up for that day.

At 5th 레벨, and at every five 레벨 thereafter, the 성기사 may smite evil one additional time per day, as indicated on Table: The 성기사, to a maximum of five times per day at 20th 레벨.

신성 Grace (Su): At 2nd 레벨, a 성기사 gains a bonus equal to her 매력 bonus (if any) on all 내성 굴림.

Lay on Hands (Su): Beginning at 2nd 레벨, a 성기사 with a 매력 score of 12 or higher can 치료 wounds (her own or those of others) by touch. Each day she can 치료 a total number of 히트 포인트 of 피해 equal to her 성기사 레벨 x her 매력 bonus. A 성기사 may choose to divide her 치료 among multiple recipients, and she doesn’t have to use it all at once. Using lay on hands is a standard action.

Alternatively, a 성기사 can use any or all of this 치료 power to deal 피해 to undead creatures. Using lay on hands in this way requires a successful melee touch 공격 and doesn’t provoke an 공격 of opportunity. The 성기사 decides how many of her daily allotment of points to use as 피해 after successfully touching an undead creature.

Aura of Courage (Su): Beginning at 3rd 레벨, a 성기사 is immune to 공포 (magical or otherwise). Each ally within 10 feet of her gains a +4 morale bonus on 내성 굴림 against 공포 effects.

This ability functions while the 성기사 is conscious, but not if she is unconscious or 죽음.

신성 Health (Ex): At 3rd 레벨, a 성기사 gains immunity to all 질병, including supernatural and magical 질병.

Turn Undead (Su):When a 성기사 reaches 4 레벨, she gains the supernatural ability to turn undead. She may use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her 매력 modifier. She turns undead as a 사제 of three 레벨 lower would.

주문: Beginning at 4 레벨, a 성기사 gains the ability to cast a small number of 신성 주문, which are drawn from the 성기사 spell list. A 성기사 must choose and prepare her 주문 in advance.

To prepare or 주문 시전, a 성기사 must have a 지혜 score equal to at least 10 + the spell 레벨. The 난이도 등급 for a 내성 굴림 against a 성기사’s spell is 10 + the spell 레벨 + the 성기사’s 지혜 modifier.

Like other spellcasters, a 성기사 can cast only a certain number of 주문 of each spell 레벨 per day. Her base daily spell allotment is given on Table: The 성기사. In addition, she receives bonus 주문 per day if she has a high 지혜 score. When Table: The 성기사 indicates that the 성기사 gets 0 주문 per day of a given spell 레벨, she gains only the bonus 주문 she would be entitled to based on her 지혜 score for that spell 레벨 The 성기사 does not have access to any domain 주문 or granted powers, as a 사제 does.

A 성기사 prepares and casts 주문 the way a 사제 does, though she cannot lose a prepared spell to spontaneously cast a cure spell in its place. A 성기사 may prepare and cast any spell on the 성기사 spell list, provided that she can cast 주문 of that 레벨, but she must choose which 주문 to prepare during her daily meditation.

Through 3rd 레벨, a 성기사 has no 시전자 레벨. At 4 레벨 and higher, her 시전자 레벨 is one-half her 성기사 레벨.

Special 탈것 소환 (Sp): Upon reaching 5th 레벨, a 성기사 gains the service of an unusually intelligent, strong, and loyal steed to serve her in her crusade against evil (see below). This 탈것 소환 is usually a heavy warhorse (for a Medium 성기사) or a warpony (for a Small 성기사).

Once per day, as a full-round action, a 성기사 may magically call her 탈것 소환 from the celestial realms in which it resides. This ability is the equivalent of a spell of a 레벨 equal to one-third the 성기사’s 레벨. The 탈것 소환 immediately appears adjacent to the 성기사 and remains for 2 hours per 성기사 레벨; it may be dismissed at any time as a free action. The 탈것 소환 is the same creature each time it is summoned, though the 성기사 may release a particular 탈것 소환 from service.

Each time the 탈것 소환 is called, it appears in full health, regardless of any 피해 it may have taken previously. The 탈것 소환 also appears wearing or carrying any gear it had when it was last dismissed. Calling a 탈것 소환 is a 창조술 (calling) effect.

Should the 성기사’s 탈것 소환 die, it immediately disappears, leaving behind any 장비 it was carrying. The 성기사 may not summon another 탈것 소환 for thirty days or until she gains a 성기사 레벨, whichever comes first, even if the 탈것 소환 is somehow returned from the 죽음. During this thirty-day period, the 성기사 takes a –1 penalty on 공격 and weapon 피해 rolls.

질병 제거 (Sp): At 6th 레벨, a 성기사 can produce a 질병 제거 effect, as the spell, once per week. She can use this ability one additional time per week for every three 레벨 after 6th (twice per week at 9th, three times at 12th, and so forth).

Code of Conduct: A 성기사 must be of lawful good 성향 and loses all class 능력 if she ever willingly commits an evil act.

Additionally, a 성기사’s code requires that she respect legitimate authority, act with honor (not lying, not cheating, not using 독, and so forth), help those in need (provided they do not use the help for evil or chaotic ends), and punish those who 해악 or threaten innocents.

Associates: While she may adventure with characters of any good or neutral 성향, a 성기사 will never knowingly associate with evil characters, nor will she continue an association with someone who consistently offends her moral code. A 성기사 may accept only henchmen, followers, or cohorts who are lawful good.

전 성기사
Ex-Paladins

A 성기사 who ceases to be lawful good, who willfully commits an evil act, or who grossly violates the code of conduct loses all 성기사 주문 and 능력 (including the service of the 성기사’s 탈것 소환, but not weapon, 갑옷, and 방패 proficiencies). She may not progress any farther in 레벨 as a 성기사. She regains her 능력 and 성장 potential if she atones for her violations (see the 속죄 spell 묘사), as appropriate.

Like a member of any other class, a 성기사 may be a multiclass character, but multiclass 성기사 face a special restriction. A 성기사 who gains a 레벨 in any class other than 성기사 may never again raise her 성기사 레벨, though she retains all her 성기사 능력.

THE 성기사’S 탈것 소환

The 성기사’s 탈것 소환 is superior to a normal 탈것 소환 of its kind and has special powers, as described below. The standard 탈것 소환 for a Medium 성기사 is a heavy warhorse, and the standard 탈것 소환 for a Small 성기사 is a warpony. Another kind of 탈것 소환, such as a riding 개 (for a 하플링 성기사) or a Large 상어 (for a 성기사 in an aquatic campaign) may be allowed as well.

A 성기사’s 탈것 소환 is treated as a magical beast, not an animal, for the 목적 of all effects that depend on its type (though it retains an animal’s HD, base 공격 보너스, 내성 굴림, skill points, and 특기).

성기사 레벨 Bonus HD Natural 갑옷 Adj. Str Adj. Int Special
5th–7th +2 +4 +1 6 Empathic link, improved evasion, share 주문, share 내성 굴림
8th–10th +4 +6 +2 7 Improved 속도
11th–14th +6 +8 +3 8 명령 creatures of its kind
15th–20th +8 +10 +4 9 주문 저항

성기사’s 탈것 소환 Basics: Use the base statistics for a creature of the 탈것 소환’s kind,but make changes to take into account the attributes and characteristics summarized on the table and described below.

Bonus HD: Extra eight-sided (d8) 히트 다이스, each of which gains a 건강 modifier, as normal. Extra 히트 다이스 improve the 탈것 소환’s base 공격 and base save bonuses. A special 탈것 소환’s base 공격 보너스 is equal to that of a 사제 of a 레벨 equal to the 탈것 소환’s HD. A 탈것 소환 has good Fortitude and Reflex 내성 굴림 (treat it as a character whose 레벨 equals the animal’s HD). The 탈것 소환 gains additional skill points or 특기 for bonus HD as normal for advancing a monster’s 히트 다이스.

Natural 갑옷 Adj.: The number on the table is an improvement to the 탈것 소환’s existing natural 갑옷 bonus.

Str Adj.: Add this figure to the 탈것 소환’s 근력 score.

Int: The 탈것 소환’s 지능 score.

Empathic Link (Su): The 성기사 has an empathic link with her 탈것 소환 out to a distance of up to 1 mile. The 성기사 cannot see through the 탈것 소환’s eyes, but they can communicate empathically.

Note that even intelligent 탈것 소환 see the world differently from 인간, so misunderstandings are always possible.

Because of this empathic link, the 성기사 has the same connection to an item or place that her 탈것 소환 does, just as with a master and his familiar (see Familiars).

Improved Evasion (Ex): When subjected to an 공격 that normally allows a Reflex 내성 굴림 for half 피해, a 탈것 소환 takes no 피해 if it makes a successful 내성 굴림 and half 피해 if the 내성 굴림 fails.

Share 주문: At the 성기사’s option, she may have any spell (but not any spell-like ability) she casts on herself also affect her 탈것 소환.

The 탈것 소환 must be within 5 feet at the time of casting to receive the benefit. If the spell or effect has a 지속시간 other than instantaneous, it stops affecting the 탈것 소환 if it 이동 farther than 5 feet away and will not affect the 탈것 소환 again even if it returns to the 성기사 before the 지속시간 expires. Additionally, the 성기사 may 주문 시전 with a target of “You” on her 탈것 소환 (as a touch 범위 spell) instead of on herself. A 성기사 and her 탈것 소환 can share 주문 even if the 주문 normally do not affect creatures of the 탈것 소환’s type (magical beast).

Share 내성 굴림: For each of its 내성 굴림, the 탈것 소환 uses its own base save bonus or the 성기사’s, whichever is higher. The 탈것 소환 applies its own 능력 수정치 to 내성 굴림, and it doesn’t share any other bonuses on 내성 굴림 that the master might have.

Improved 속도 (Ex): The 탈것 소환’s 속도 increases by 10 feet.

명령 (Sp): Once per day per two 성기사 레벨 of its master, a 탈것 소환 can use this ability to 명령 other any normal animal of approximately the same kind as itself (for warhorses and warponies, this category includes 당나귀, 노새, and ponies), as long as the target creature has fewer 히트 다이스 than the 탈것 소환. This ability functions like the 명령 spell, but the 탈것 소환 must make a DC 21 집중 check to succeed if it’s being ridden at the time. If the check fails, the ability does not work that time, but it still counts against the 탈것 소환’s daily uses. Each target may attempt a Will save (DC 10 + 1/2 성기사’s 레벨 + 성기사’s Cha modifier) to negate the effect.

주문 저항 (Ex): A 탈것 소환’s 주문 저항 equals its master’s 성기사 레벨 + 5. To affect the 탈것 소환 with a spell, a spellcaster must get a result on a 시전자 레벨 check (1d20 + 시전자 레벨) that equals or exceeds the 탈것 소환’s 주문 저항.

레인저

RANGER

성향: Any.

Hit Die: d8.

직업 스킬
Class Skills

The 레인저’s 직업 스킬 (and the key ability for each skill) are 등반 (Str), 집중 (Con), 제작 (Int), 동물 조련 (Cha), 치료 (Wis), 숨기 (Dex), 도약 (Str), 지식 (dungeoneering) (Int), 지식 (geography) (Int), 지식 (nature) (Int), 듣기 (Wis), 조용히 이동 (Dex), 전문직 (Wis), 탑승 (Dex), 탐색 (Int), 감지 (Wis), 생존 (Wis), 수영 (Str), and 밧줄 사용 (Dex).

Skill Points at 1 레벨: (6 + Int modifier) x4.

Skill Points at Each Additional 레벨: 6 + Int modifier.

직업 특성
Class Features

All of the following are 직업 특성 of the 레인저.

Weapon and 갑옷 숙련: A 레인저 is proficient with all simple and martial 무기, and with 빛 갑옷 및 방패 (except tower 방패).

Favored Enemy (Ex): At 1 레벨, a 레인저 may select a type of creature from among those given on Table: 레인저 Favored Enemies. The 레인저 gains a +2 bonus on 허세, 듣기, 의도 파악, 감지, and 생존 checks when using these 스킬 against creatures of this type. Likewise, he gets a +2 bonus on weapon 피해 rolls against such creatures.

At 5th 레벨 and every five 레벨 thereafter (10th, 15th, and 20th 레벨), the 레인저 may select an additional favored enemy from those given on the table. In addition, at each such interval, the bonus against any one favored enemy (including the one just selected, if so desired) increases by 2.

If the 레인저 chooses humanoids or outsiders as a favored enemy, he must also choose an associated subtype, as indicated on the table. If a specific creature falls into more than one category of favored enemy, the 레인저’s bonuses do not stack; he simply uses whichever bonus is higher.

추적: A 레인저 gains 추적 as a bonus feat.

Wild 공감 (Ex): A 레인저 can improve the attitude of an animal. This ability functions just like a 외교 check to improve the attitude of a person. The 레인저 rolls 1d20 and adds his 레인저 레벨 and his 매력 bonus to determine the wild 공감 check result. The typical domestic animal has a starting attitude of indifferent, while wild animals are usually unfriendly.

To use wild 공감, the 레인저 and the animal must be able to study each other, which means that they must be within 30 feet of one another under normal visibility 상태이상. Generally, influencing an animal in this way takes 1 minute, but, as with influencing people, it might take more or less time.

The 레인저 can also use this ability to influence a magical beast with an 지능 score of 1 or 2, but he takes a –4 penalty on the check.

전투 Style (Ex): At 2nd 레벨, a 레인저 must select one of two 전투 styles to pursue: archery or two-weapon 전투. This choice affects the character’s 직업 특성 but does not restrict his selection of 특기 or 특수 능력 in any way.

If the 레인저 selects archery, he is treated as having the 재빠른 사격 feat, even if he does not have the normal 전제조건 for that feat.

If the 레인저 selects two-weapon 전투, he is treated as having the 쌍수 무기 전투술 feat, even if he does not have the normal 전제조건 for that feat.

The benefits of the 레인저’s chosen style apply only when he wears 빛 or no 갑옷. He loses all benefits of his 전투 style when wearing medium or heavy 갑옷.

지구력: A 레인저 gains 지구력 as a bonus feat at 3rd 레벨.

Animal Companion (Ex): At 4 레벨, a 레인저 gains an animal companion selected from the following list: 오소리, 낙타, 흉폭한 시궁쥐, 개, 탈것 개, 독수리, 매, 말 (빛 or heavy), 부엉이, 조랑말, 뱀 (Small or Medium viper), or 늑대. If the campaign takes place wholly or partly in an aquatic 환경, the following creatures may be added to the 레인저’s list of options: 악어, 쇠돌고래, Medium 상어, and 오징어. This animal is a loyal companion that accompanies the 레인저 on his adventures as appropriate for its kind.

This ability functions like the 드루이드 ability of the same 이름, except that the 레인저’s effective 드루이드 레벨 is one-half his 레인저 레벨. A 레인저 may select from the alternative lists of animal companions just as a 드루이드 can, though again his effective 드루이드 레벨 is half his 레인저 레벨. Like a 드루이드, a 레인저 cannot select an alternative animal if the choice would reduce his effective 드루이드 레벨 below 1st.

주문: Beginning at 4 레벨, a 레인저 gains the ability to cast a small number of 신성 주문, which are drawn from the 레인저 spell list. A 레인저 must choose and prepare his 주문 in advance (see below).

To prepare or 주문 시전, a 레인저 must have a 지혜 score equal to at least 10 + the spell 레벨. The 난이도 등급 for a 내성 굴림 against a 레인저’s spell is 10 + the spell 레벨 + the 레인저’s 지혜 modifier.

Like other spellcasters, a 레인저 can cast only a certain number of 주문 of each spell 레벨 per day. His base daily spell allotment is given on Table: The 레인저. In addition, he receives bonus 주문 per day if he has a high 지혜 score. When Table: The 레인저 indicates that the 레인저 gets 0 주문 per day of a given spell 레벨, he gains only the bonus 주문 he would be entitled to based on his 지혜 score for that spell 레벨. The 레인저 does not have access to any domain 주문 or granted powers, as a 사제 does.

A 레인저 prepares and casts 주문 the way a 사제 does, though he cannot lose a prepared spell to cast a cure spell in its place. A 레인저 may prepare and cast any spell on the 레인저 spell list, provided that he can cast 주문 of that 레벨, but he must choose which 주문 to prepare during his daily meditation.

Through 3rd 레벨, a 레인저 has no 시전자 레벨. At 4 레벨 and higher, his 시전자 레벨 is one-half his 레인저 레벨.

Improved 전투 Style (Ex): At 6th 레벨, a 레인저’s aptitude in his chosen 전투 style (archery or two-weapon 전투) improves. If he selected archery at 2nd 레벨, he is treated as having the 다수 사격 feat, even if he does not have the normal 전제조건 for that feat.

If the 레인저 selected two-weapon 전투 at 2nd 레벨, he is treated as having the 향상된 쌍수 무기 전투술 feat, even if he does not have the normal 전제조건 for that feat.

As before, the benefits of the 레인저’s chosen style apply only when he wears 빛 or no 갑옷. He loses all benefits of his 전투 style when wearing medium or heavy 갑옷.

Woodland 성큼걷기 (Ex): Starting at 7 레벨, a 레인저 may 이동 through any sort of undergrowth (such as natural thorns, briars, overgrown areas, and similar terrain) at his normal 속도 and without taking 피해 or suffering any other impairment.

However, thorns, briars, and overgrown areas that are enchanted or magically manipulated to impede motion still affect him.

Swift Tracker (Ex): Beginning at 8th 레벨, a 레인저 can 이동 at his normal 속도 while following 추적 without taking the normal –5 penalty. He takes only a –10 penalty (instead of the normal –20) when moving at up to twice normal 속도 while tracking.

Evasion (Ex): At 9th 레벨, a 레인저 can avoid even magical and unusual 공격 with great agility. If he makes a successful Reflex 내성 굴림 against an 공격 that normally deals half 피해 on a successful save, he instead takes no 피해. Evasion can be used only if the 레인저 is wearing 빛 갑옷 or no 갑옷. A helpless 레인저 does not gain the benefit of evasion.

전투 Style Mastery (Ex): At 11th 레벨, a 레인저’s aptitude in his chosen 전투 style (archery or two-weapon 전투) improves again. If he selected archery at 2nd 레벨, he is treated as having the 향상된 정밀 사격 feat, even if he does not have the normal 전제조건 for that feat.

If the 레인저 selected two-weapon 전투 at 2nd 레벨, he is treated as having the 상급 쌍수 무기 전투술 feat, even if he does not have the normal 전제조건 for that feat.

As before, the benefits of the 레인저’s chosen style apply only when he wears 빛 or no 갑옷. He loses all benefits of his 전투 style when wearing medium or heavy 갑옷.

Camouflage (Ex): A 레인저 of 13 레벨 이상 can use the 숨기 skill in any sort of natural terrain, even if the terrain doesn’t grant 엄폐 or 은폐.

숨기 in Plain Sight (Ex): While in any sort of natural terrain, a 레인저 of 17th 레벨 or higher can use the 숨기 skill even while being observed.

도적

ROGUE

성향: Any.

Hit Die: d6.

Class Skills

The 도적’s 직업 스킬 (and the key ability for each skill) are 감정 (Int), 균형 (Dex), 허세 (Cha), 등반 (Str), 제작 (Int), 문자 해독 (Int), 외교 (Cha), 장치 무력화 (Int), 변장 (Cha), 탈출 전문가 (Dex), 위조 (Int), 정보 수집 (Cha), 숨기 (Dex), 위협 (Cha), 도약 (Str), 지식 (local) (Int), 듣기 (Wis), 조용히 이동 (Dex), 자물쇠 열기 (Dex), 공연 (Cha), 전문직 (Wis), 탐색 (Int), 의도 파악 (Wis), 날렵한 손재주 (Dex), 감지 (Wis), 수영 (Str), 재주넘기 (Dex), 마법 장치 사용 (Cha), and 밧줄 사용 (Dex).

Skill Points at 1 레벨: (8 + Int modifier) x4.

Skill Points at Each Additional 레벨: 8 + Int modifier.

직업 특성
Class Features

All of the following are 직업 특성 of the 도적.

Weapon and 갑옷 숙련: 도적 are proficient with all simple 무기, plus the hand crossbow, rapier, sap, shortbow, and short sword. 도적 are proficient with 빛 갑옷, but not with 방패.

Sneak 공격: If a 도적 can catch an opponent when he is unable to defend himself effectively from her 공격, she can strike a vital 감지 for extra 피해.

The 도적’s 공격 deals extra 피해 any time her target would be denied a 민첩 bonus to AC (whether the target actually has a 민첩 bonus or not), or when the 도적 flanks her target. This extra 피해 is 1d6 at 1 레벨, and it increases by 1d6 every two 도적 레벨 thereafter. Should the 도적 score a critical hit with a sneak 공격, this extra 피해 is not multiplied.

Ranged 공격 can count as sneak 공격 only if the target is within 30 feet.

With a sap (blackjack) or an unarmed strike, a 도적 can make a sneak 공격 that deals 비치명적인 피해 instead of lethal 피해. She cannot use a weapon that deals lethal 피해 to deal 비치명적인 피해 in a sneak 공격, not even with the usual –4 penalty.

A 도적 can sneak 공격 only living creatures with discernible anatomies—undead, constructs, 늪괴물, plants, and incorporeal creatures lack vital areas to 공격. Any creature that is immune to critical hits is not vulnerable to sneak 공격. The 도적 must be able to see the target well enough to pick out a vital 감지 and must be able to reach such a 감지. A 도적 cannot sneak 공격 while striking a creature with 은폐 or striking the limbs of a creature whose vitals are beyond reach.

Trapfinding: 도적 (and only 도적) can use the 탐색 skill to locate 함정 when the task has a 난이도 등급 higher than 20.

Finding a nonmagical trap has a DC of at least 20, or higher if it is well hidden. Finding a magic trap has a DC of 25 + the 레벨 of the spell used to create it.

도적 (and only 도적) can use the 장치 무력화 skill to 무장해제 마법 함정. A magic trap generally has a DC of 25 + the 레벨 of the spell used to create it.

A 도적 who beats a trap’s DC by 10 or more with a 장치 무력화 check can study a trap, figure out how it works, and 바이패스 it (with her party) without disarming it.

Evasion (Ex): At 2nd 레벨 and higher, a 도적 can avoid even magical and unusual 공격 with great agility. If she makes a successful Reflex 내성 굴림 against an 공격 that normally deals half 피해 on a successful save, she instead takes no 피해. Evasion can be used only if the 도적 is wearing 빛 갑옷 or no 갑옷. A helpless 도적 does not gain the benefit of evasion.

함정 감각 (Ex): At 3rd 레벨, a 도적 gains an intuitive sense that alerts her to danger from 함정, giving her a +1 bonus on Reflex 내성 굴림 made to avoid 함정 and a +1 회피 bonus to AC against 공격 made by 함정. These bonuses rise to +2 when the 도적 reaches 6th 레벨, to +3 when she reaches 9th 레벨, to +4 when she reaches 12th 레벨, to +5 at 15th, and to +6 at 18th 레벨.

함정 감각 bonuses gained from multiple classes stack.

Uncanny 회피 (Ex): Starting at 4 레벨, a 도적 can react to danger before her senses would normally allow her to do so. She retains her 민첩 bonus to AC (if any) even if she is caught flat-footed or struck by an invisible attacker. However, she still loses her 민첩 bonus to AC if immobilized.

If a 도적 already has uncanny 회피 from a different class she automatically gains improved uncanny 회피 (see below) instead.

Improved Uncanny 회피 (Ex): A 도적 of 8th 레벨 or higher can no longer be flanked.

This defense denies another 도적 the ability to sneak 공격 the character by 협공 her, unless the attacker has at least four more 도적 레벨 than the target does.

If a character already has uncanny 회피 (see above) from a second class, the character automatically gains improved uncanny 회피 instead, and the 레벨 from the classes that grant uncanny 회피 stack to determine the minimum 도적 레벨 required to flank the character.

특수 능력: On attaining 10 레벨, and at every three 레벨 thereafter (13th, 16th, and 19th), a 도적 gains a special ability of her choice from among the following options.

Crippling Strike (Ex): A 도적 with this ability can sneak 공격 opponents with such precision that her blows weaken and hamper them. An opponent damaged by one of her sneak 공격 also takes 2 points of 근력 피해. Ability points lost to 피해 return on their own at the rate of 1 point per day for each damaged ability.

Defensive Roll (Ex): The 도적 can roll with a potentially lethal blow to take less 피해 from it than she otherwise would. Once per day, when she would be reduced to 0 or fewer 히트 포인트 by 피해 in 전투 (from a weapon or other blow, not a spell or special ability), the 도적 can attempt to roll with the 피해. To use this ability, the 도적 must attempt a Reflex 내성 굴림 (DC = 피해 dealt). If the save succeeds, she takes only half 피해 from the blow; if it fails, she takes full 피해. She must be aware of the 공격 and able to react to it in order to execute her defensive roll—if she is denied her 민첩 bonus to AC, she can’t use this ability. Since this effect would not normally allow a character to make a Reflex save for half 피해, the 도적’s evasion ability does not apply to the defensive roll.

Improved Evasion (Ex): This ability works like evasion, except that while the 도적 still takes no 피해 on a successful Reflex 내성 굴림 against 공격 henceforth she henceforth takes only half 피해 on a failed save. A helpless 도적 does not gain the benefit of improved evasion.

Opportunist (Ex): Once per round, the 도적 can make an 공격 of opportunity against an opponent who has just been struck for 피해 in melee by another character. This 공격 counts as the 도적’s 공격 of opportunity for that round. Even a 도적 with the 전투 반사 feat can’t use the opportunist ability more than once per round.

Skill Mastery: The 도적 becomes so certain in the use of certain 스킬 that she can use them reliably even under adverse 상태이상.

Upon gaining this ability, she selects a number of 스킬 equal to 3 + her 지능 modifier. When making a skill check with one of these 스킬, she may take 10 even if stress and distractions would normally prevent her from doing so. A 도적 may gain this special ability multiple times, selecting additional 스킬 for it to apply to each time.

Slippery Mind (Ex): This ability represents the 도적’s ability to wriggle free from magical effects that would otherwise control or compel her. If a 도적 with slippery mind is affected by an 마력부여술 spell or effect and fails her 내성 굴림, she can attempt it again 1 round later at the same DC. She gets only this one extra chance to succeed on

her 내성 굴림.

Feat: A 도적 may gain a bonus feat in place of a special ability.

직업 특성
Class Features

All of the following are 직업 특성 of the 소서러.

Weapon and 갑옷 숙련: 소서러 are proficient with all simple 무기. They are not proficient with any type of 갑옷 or 방패. 갑옷 of any type interferes with a 소서러’s gestures, which can cause his 주문 with somatic 구성요소 to fail.

주문: A 소서러 casts 비전 주문 which are drawn primarily from the 소서러/마법사 spell list. He can cast any spell he knows without preparing it ahead of time, the way a 마법사 or a 사제 must (see below).

To learn or 주문 시전, a 소서러 must have a 매력 score equal to at least 10 + the spell 레벨. The 난이도 등급 for a 내성 굴림 against a 소서러’s spell is 10 + the spell 레벨 + the 소서러’s 매력 modifier.

Like other spellcasters, a 소서러 can cast only a certain number of 주문 of each spell 레벨 per day. His base daily spell allotment is given on Table: The 소서러. In addition, he receives bonus 주문 per day if he has a high 매력 score.

A 소서러’s selection of 주문 is extremely limited. A 소서러 begins play knowing four 0-레벨 주문 and two 1st-레벨 주문 of your choice. At each new 소서러 레벨, he gains one or more 새로운 주문, as indicated on Table: 소서러 주문 Known. (Unlike 주문 per day, the number of 주문 a 소서러 knows is not affected by his 매력 score; the numbers on Table: 소서러 주문 Known are fixed.) These 새로운 주문 can be common 주문 chosen from the 소서러/마법사 spell list, or they can be unusual 주문 that the 소서러 has gained some understanding of by study. The 소서러 can’t use this method of spell acquisition to learn 주문 at a faster rate, however.

Upon reaching 4 레벨, and at every even-numbered 소서러 레벨 after that (6th, 8th, and so on), a 소서러 can choose to learn a new spell in place of one he already knows. In effect, the 소서러 “loses” the old spell in exchange for the new one. The new spell’s 레벨 must be the same as that of the spell being exchanged, and it must be at least two 레벨 lower than the highest-레벨 소서러 spell the 소서러 can cast. A 소서러 may swap only a single spell at any given 레벨, and must choose whether or not to swap the spell at the same time that he gains 새로운 주문 known for the 레벨.

Unlike a 마법사 or a 사제, a 소서러 need not prepare his 주문 in advance. He can cast any spell he knows at any time, assuming he has not yet used up his 주문 per day for that spell 레벨. He does not have to decide ahead of time which 주문 he’ll cast.

Familiar: A 소서러 can obtain a familiar (see below). Doing so takes 24 hours and uses up magical materials that cost 100 gp. A familiar is a magical beast that resembles a small animal and is unusually tough and intelligent. The creature serves as a companion and servant.

The 소서러 chooses the kind of familiar he gets. As the 소서러 advances in 레벨, his familiar also increases in power.

If the familiar dies or is dismissed by the 소서러, the 소서러 must attempt a DC 15 Fortitude 내성 굴림. Failure means he loses 200 experience points per 소서러 레벨; success reduces the loss to one-half that amount. However, a 소서러’s experience point total can never go below 0 as the result of a familiar’s demise or 차원 강제퇴거. A slain or dismissed familiar cannot be replaced for a year and day. A slain familiar can be raised from the 죽음 just as a character can be, and it does not lose a 레벨 or a 건강 point when this happy event occurs.

A character with more than one class that grants a familiar may have only one familiar at a time.

직업 특성
Class Features

All of the following are 직업 특성 of the 마법사.

Weapon and 갑옷 숙련: 마법사 are proficient with the club, dagger, heavy crossbow, 빛 crossbow, and quarterstaff, but not with any type of 갑옷 or 방패. 갑옷 of any type interferes with a 마법사’s 이동, which can cause her 주문 with somatic 구성요소 to fail.

주문: A 마법사 casts 비전 주문 which are drawn from the 소서러/ 마법사 spell list. A 마법사 must choose and prepare her 주문 ahead of time (see below).

To learn, prepare, or 주문 시전, the 마법사 must have an 지능 score equal to at least 10 + the spell 레벨. The 난이도 등급 for a 내성 굴림 against a 마법사’s spell is 10 + the spell 레벨 + the 마법사’s 지능 modifier.

Like other spellcasters, a 마법사 can cast only a certain number of 주문 of each spell 레벨 per day. Her base daily spell allotment is given on Table: The 마법사. In addition, she receives bonus 주문 per day if she has a high 지능 score.

Unlike a 음유시인 or 소서러, a 마법사 may know any number of 주문. She must choose and prepare her 주문 ahead of time by getting a good night’s 수면 and spending 1 hour studying her spellbook. While studying, the 마법사 decides which 주문 to prepare.

Bonus Languages: A 마법사 may substitute Draconic for one of the bonus languages available to the character because of her race.

Familiar: A 마법사 can obtain a familiar in exactly the same manner as a 소서러 can. See the 소서러 묘사 and the information on Familiars below for details.

마법두루마리 제작: At 1 레벨, a 마법사 gains 마법두루마리 제작 as a bonus feat.

Bonus 특기: At 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th 레벨, a 마법사 gains a bonus feat. At each such opportunity, she can choose a 메타마법 feat, an item creation feat, or 주문 마스터. The 마법사 must still meet all 전제조건 for a bonus feat, including 시전자 레벨 minimums.

These bonus 특기 are in addition to the feat that a character of any class gets from advancing 레벨. The 마법사 is not limited to the categories of 아이템 제작 특기, 메타마법 특기, or 주문 마스터 when choosing these 특기.

Spellbooks: A 마법사 must study her spellbook each day to prepare her 주문. She cannot prepare any spell not recorded in her spellbook, except for 마법 읽기, which all 마법사 can prepare from memory.

A 마법사 begins play with a spellbook containing all 0-레벨 마법사 주문 (except those from her prohibited 학파 or 학파, if any; see 학파 Specialization, below) plus three 1st-레벨 주문 of your choice. For each point of 지능 bonus the 마법사 has, the spellbook holds one additional 1st-레벨 spell of your choice. At each new 마법사 레벨, she gains two 새로운 주문 of any spell 레벨 or 레벨 that she can cast (based on her new 마법사 레벨) for her spellbook. At any time, a 마법사 can also add 주문 found in other 마법사’ spellbooks to her own.

학파 SPECIALIZATION

A 학파 is one of eight groupings of 주문, each defined by a common theme. If desired, a 마법사 may specialize in one 학파 of magic (see below). Specialization allows a 마법사 to cast extra 주문 from her chosen 학파, but she then never learns to cast 주문 from some other 학파.

A specialist 마법사 can prepare one additional spell of her specialty 학파 per spell 레벨 each day. She also gains a +2 bonus on 주문학 checks to learn the 주문 of her chosen 학파.

The 마법사 must choose whether to specialize and, if she does so, choose her specialty at 1 레벨. At this time, she must also give up two other 학파 of magic (unless she chooses to specialize in 점술; see below), which become her prohibited 학파.

A 마법사 can never give up 점술 to fulfill this requirement.

주문 of the prohibited 학파 or 학파 are not available to the 마법사, and she can’t even cast such 주문 from 두루마리 or fire them from 마법막대. She may not change either her specialization or her prohibited 학파 later.

The eight 학파 of arcane magic are 회피술, 창조술, 점술, 마력부여술, 환기, 환상, 강령술, and 변환.

주문 that do not fall into any of these 학파 are called universal 주문.

회피술: 주문 that protect, block, or banish. An 회피술 specialist is called an abjurer.

창조술: 주문 that bring creatures or materials to the caster. A 창조술 specialist is called a conjurer.

점술: 주문 that reveal information. A 점술 specialist is called a diviner. Unlike the other specialists, a diviner must give up only one other 학파.

마력부여술: 주문 that imbue the recipient with some property or grant the caster power over another being. An 마력부여술 specialist is called an enchanter.

환기: 주문 that manipulate energy or create something from nothing. An 환기 specialist is called an evoker.

환상: 주문 that alter perception or create false images. An 환상 specialist is called an illusionist.

강령술: 주문 that manipulate, create, or destroy life or life force. A 강령술 specialist is called a necromancer.

변환: 주문 that transform the recipient physically or change its properties in a more subtle way. A 변환 specialist is called a transmuter.

Universal: Not a 학파, but a category for 주문 that all 마법사 can learn. A 마법사 cannot select universal as a specialty 학파 or as a prohibited 학파. Only a limited number of 주문 fall into this category.

FAMILIARS

A familiar is a normal animal that gains new powers and becomes a magical beast when summoned to service by a 소서러 or 마법사. It retains the appearance, 히트 다이스, base 공격 보너스, base save bonuses, 스킬, and 특기 of the normal animal it once was, but it is treated as a magical beast instead of an animal for the 목적 of any effect that depends on its type. Only a normal, unmodified animal may become a familiar. An animal companion cannot also function as a familiar.

A familiar also grants 특수 능력 to its master (a 소서러 or 마법사), as given on the table below. These 특수 능력 apply only when the master and familiar are within 1 mile of each other.

레벨 of different classes that are entitled to familiars stack for the 목적 of determining any familiar 능력 that depend on the master’s 레벨.

도마뱀 Master gains a +3 bonus on 등반 checks
부엉이 Master gains a +3 bonus on 감지 checks in 어둠
시궁쥐 Master gains a +2 bonus on Fortitude 내성 굴림

Familiar Basics: Use the basic statistics for a creature of the familiar’s kind, but make the following

changes:

히트 다이스: For the 목적 of effects related to number of 히트 다이스, use the master’s character 레벨 or the familiar’s normal HD total, whichever is higher.

히트 포인트: The familiar has one-half the master’s total 히트 포인트 (not including 임시 히트 포인트), rounded down, regardless of its actual 히트 다이스.

공격: Use the master’s base 공격 보너스, as calculated from all his classes. Use the familiar’s 민첩 or 근력 modifier, whichever is 상급, to get the familiar’s melee 공격 보너스 with natural 무기.

피해 equals that of a normal creature of the familiar’s kind.

내성 굴림: For each 내성 굴림, use either the familiar’s base save bonus (Fortitude +2, Reflex +2, Will +0) or the master’s (as calculated from all his classes), whichever is better. The familiar uses its own 능력 수정치 to 내성 굴림, and it doesn’t share any of the other bonuses that the master might have on 내성 굴림.

스킬: For each skill in which either the master or the familiar has ranks, use either the normal skill ranks for an animal of that type or the master’s skill ranks, whichever are better. In either case, the familiar uses its own 능력 수정치. Regardless of a familiar’s total skill modifiers, some 스킬 may remain beyond the familiar’s ability to use.

Familiar Ability 묘사: All familiars have 특수 능력 (or impart 능력 to their masters) depending on the master’s combined 레벨 in classes that grant familiars, as shown on the table below. 능력 given on the table are cumulative.

Natural 갑옷 Adj.: The number noted here is an improvement to the familiar’s existing natural 갑옷 bonus.

Int: The familiar’s 지능 score.

경계 (Ex): While a familiar is within arm’s reach, the master gains the 경계 feat.

Improved Evasion (Ex): When subjected to an 공격 that normally allows a Reflex 내성 굴림 for half 피해, a familiar takes no 피해 if it makes a successful 내성 굴림 and half 피해 even if the 내성 굴림 fails.

Share 주문: At the master’s option, he may have any spell (but not any spell-like ability) he casts on himself also affect his familiar. The familiar must be within 5 feet at the time of casting to receive the benefit.

If the spell or effect has a 지속시간 other than instantaneous, it stops affecting the familiar if it 이동 farther than 5 feet away and will not affect the familiar again even if it returns to the master before the 지속시간 expires. Additionally, the master may 주문 시전 with a target of “You” on his familiar (as a touch 범위 spell) instead of on himself.

A master and his familiar can share 주문 even if the 주문 normally do not affect creatures of the familiar’s type (magical beast).

Empathic Link (Su): The master has an empathic link with his familiar out to a distance of up to 1 mile. The master cannot see through the familiar’s eyes, but they can communicate empathically. Because of the limited nature of the link, only general emotional content can be communicated.

Because of this empathic link, the master has the same connection to an item or place that his familiar does.

Deliver Touch 주문 (Su): If the master is 3rd 레벨 or higher, a familiar can deliver touch 주문 for him. If the master and the familiar are in contact at the time the master casts a touch spell, he can designate his familiar as the “toucher.” The familiar can then deliver the touch spell just as the master could. As usual, if the master casts another spell before the touch is delivered, the touch spell dissipates.

말하기 with Master (Ex): If the master is 5th 레벨 or higher, a familiar and the master can communicate verbally as if they were using a common language. Other creatures do not understand the communication without magical help.

동물과 대화 of Its Kind (Ex): If the master is 7 레벨 이상, a familiar can communicate with animals of approximately the same kind as itself (including dire varieties): 박쥐 with 박쥐, 시궁쥐 with rodents, 고양이 with felines, 매 and 부엉이 and 큰까마귀 with birds, 도마뱀 and 뱀 with reptiles, 두꺼비 with amphibians, 족제비 with similar creatures (족제비, minks, polecats, ermines, skunks, 울버린, and 오소리). Such communication is limited by the 지능 of the conversing creatures.

주문 저항 (Ex): If the master is 11th 레벨 or higher, a familiar gains 주문 저항 equal to the master’s 레벨 + 5. To affect the familiar with a spell, another spellcaster must get a result on a 시전자 레벨 check (1d20 + 시전자 레벨) that equals or exceeds the familiar’s 주문 저항.

Scry on Familiar (Sp): If the master is 13 레벨 이상, he may scry on his familiar (as if casting the 염탐 spell) once per day.

비전 주문 AND 갑옷

마법사 and 소서러 do not know how to wear 갑옷 effectively.

If desired, they can wear 갑옷 anyway (though they’ll be clumsy in it), or they can gain training in the proper use of 갑옷 (with the various 갑옷 숙련 특기—빛, medium, and heavy—and the 방패 숙련 feat), or they can multiclass to add a class that grants them 갑옷 숙련. Even if a 마법사 or 소서러 is wearing 갑옷 with which he or she is proficient, however, it might still interfere with spellcasting.

갑옷 restricts the complicated gestures that a 마법사 or 소서러 must make while casting any spell that has a somatic component (most do). The 갑옷 and 방패 묘사 list the arcane 주문 실패 chance for different 갑옷 and 방패.

By contrast, 음유시인 not only know how to wear 빛 갑옷 effectively, but they can also ignore the arcane 주문 실패 chance for such 갑옷. A 음유시인 wearing 갑옷 heavier than 빛 or using any type of 방패 incurs the normal arcane 주문 실패 chance, even if he becomes proficient with that 갑옷.

If a spell doesn’t have a somatic component, an arcane spellcaster can cast it with no problem while wearing 갑옷. Such 주문 can also be cast even if the caster’s hands are bound or if he or she is grappling (although 집중 checks still apply normally). Also, the 메타마법 feat 부동 주문 allows a spellcaster to prepare or 주문 시전 at one spell 레벨 higher than normal without the somatic component. This also provides a way to 주문 시전 while wearing 갑옷 without risking arcane 주문 실패.

멀티직업 캐릭터

MULTICLASS CHARACTERS

A character may add new classes as he or she progresses in 레벨, thus becoming a multiclass character. The class 능력 from a character’s different classes combine to determine a multiclass character’s overall 능력. Multiclassing improves a character’s versatility at the expense of focus.

직업 및 레벨 특성

CLASS AND LEVEL FEATURES

As a general rule, 능력 of a multiclass character are the sum of 능력 of each of the character’s classes.

레벨: “Character 레벨” is a character’s total number of 레벨. It is used to determine when 특기 and ability score boosts are gained.

“Class 레벨” is a character’s 레벨 in a particular class. For a character whose 레벨 are all in the same class, character 레벨 and class 레벨 are the same.

히트 포인트: A character gains 히트 포인트 from each class as his or her class 레벨 increases, adding the new 히트 포인트 to the previous total.

Base 공격 보너스: Add the base 공격 보너스 acquired for each class to get the character’s base 공격 보너스. A resulting value of +6 or higher provides the character with multiple 공격.

내성 굴림: Add the base save bonuses for each class together.

스킬: If a skill is a class skill for any of a multiclass character’s classes, then character 레벨 determines a skill’s maximum rank. (The maximum rank for a class skill is 3 + character 레벨.)

If a skill is not a class skill for any of a multiclass character’s classes, the maximum rank for that skill is one-half the maximum for a class skill.

직업 특성: A multiclass character gets all the 직업 특성 of all his or her classes but must also suffer the consequences of the special restrictions of all his or her classes. (Exception: A character who acquires the 바바리안 class does not become illiterate.)

In the special case of turning undead, both 사제 and experienced 성기사 have the same ability. If the character’s 성기사 레벨 is 4th or higher, her effective turning 레벨 is her 사제 레벨 plus her 성기사 레벨 minus 3.

In the special case of uncanny 회피, both experienced 바바리안 and experienced 도적 have the same ability. When a 바바리안/도적 would gain uncanny 회피 a second time (for her second class), she instead gains improved uncanny 회피, if she does not already have it. Her 바바리안 and 도적 레벨 stack to determine the 도적 레벨 an attacker needs to flank her.

In the special case of obtaining a familiar, both 마법사 and 소서러 have the same ability. A 소서러/마법사 stacks his 소서러 and 마법사 레벨 to determine the familiar’s natural 갑옷, 지능 score, and 특수 능력.

특기: A multiclass character gains 특기 based on character 레벨, regardless of individual class 레벨

Ability Increases: A multiclass character gains ability score increases based on character 레벨, regardless of individual class 레벨.

주문: The character gains 주문 from all of his or her spellcasting classes and keeps a separate spell list for each class. If a spell’s effect is based on the class 레벨 of the caster, the player must keep 추적 of which class’s spell list the character is casting the spell from.
